mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_like(member_id, product_id, liked_date) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{product_id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product_like WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_like WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT p1.member_id, p1.product_id, p1.liked_date, p.thumbnail, p.product_name, p.status, p.price, p.likecount FROM product_like p1 JOIN product p ON p1.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p1.member_id = #{member_id}
